description: This view contains information about a coverage's subscriber. Used for Electronic Health Information (EHI) export.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the coverage record. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s encryption utility.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_PAT_ID
columns.description: If the subscriber is the same person as a patient, this item contains the patient ID.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_CONFDENTIAL_NAME
columns.description: This item contains the confidential name of the associated patient, if it exists. The name is used to determine the confidential nature of the subscriber.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_NUMBER
columns.description: The identification number assigned to the subscriber for the coverage. When the subscriber is also a member on the coverage, this is the same as the subscriber�s member number. This column may be hidden if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_ID_FROM_SOURCE_FILE
columns.description: Subscriber ID received on the source file for the subscriber on the coverage.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_MEDICARE_NUMBER
columns.description: Stores the subscriber's Medicare number, if applicable. This will be a Medicare Beneficiary Number (MBI) if available, or a Health Insurance Claim Number (HICN) if not.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_MEDICARE_HIC_NUMBER
columns.description: Contains the subscriber Health Insurance Claim Number (HICN) once it has been replaced by the Medicare Beneficiary Number (MBI).

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The sex of the subscriber on the coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Nonbinary


X


Other

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_GENDER_IDENTITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category ID of the subscriber's gender identity as stored on the coverage. This value may not be the same as the gender identity stored on the subscriber's patient record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Transgender Female


Transgender Male


Other


Choose not to disclose

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_RACE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The race of the subscriber.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_PREFERRED_NAME
columns.description: Stores the preferred name of the subscriber as present on the coverage record at the time of coverage creation. This value may not be the same as the preferred name stored on the subscriber's patient record.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the subscriber for the coverage. This column may be hidden if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The county of the subscriber's employer's address on a coverage


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_REL_TO_GUAR_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the subscriber's relationship to the guarantor.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Aunt


Brother


Daughter


Father


Friend


Granddaughter


Grandfather


Grandmother


Grandson


Legal Guardian


Mother


Other


Step Father


Sister


Self


Step Mother


Son


Spouse


Uncle


Employer


Unverified Proxy


Transplant Recipient

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: The house number of the subscriber's employer's address on a coverage

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The district of the subscriber's employer's address on a coverage


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_ID
columns.description: This is the unique ID of the employer of the patient subscribing to the coverage if EAF 6410 is set to 1. This is free text if EAF 6410 is set to 2.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_ID_EMPLOYER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_COMMENT
columns.description: A free text comment that can be entered when the value that is considered to be "Other" is selected as the employer. This option is available only if your organization has chosen to link the subscriber employer to the Employer (EEP) master file in the Facility Profile.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_CITY
columns.description: The City field of the subscriber's employer's address on the coverage.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The state of the subscriber's employer's address on a coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_ZIP
columns.description: The zip code of the subscriber's employer's address on a coverage

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYMENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The employment status of the subscriber's employer on a coverage (i.e. full, part, etc.).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Full Time


Part Time


Not Employed


Self Employed


Retired


On Active Military Duty


Student - Full Time


Student - Part Time


Unknown

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the country of the subscriber's employer.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_PHONE
columns.description: The phone number of the subscriber's employer on a coverage

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_FAX
columns.description: The fax number of the coverage subscriber's employer.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYEE_ID_NUMBER
columns.description: The coverage subscriber's employee ID number.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_ADDR_IS_UNDELIV_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if subscriber home address is undeliverable.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_HOUSE_NUMBER
columns.description: Subscriber House Number for non-US locales

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_CITY
columns.description: The city of the mailing address for the subscriber on the coverage.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The state of the mailing address for the subscriber on the coverage.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_STATE_C_NAME

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_SUBDIVISION_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Capture the subscriber's country subdivision code.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_ZIP
columns.description: The postal code of the mailing address for the subscriber on the coverage.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The country of the mailing address for the subscriber on the coverage.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_COUNTRY_C_NAME

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The county of the mailing address for the subscriber on the coverage.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_COUNTY_C_NAME

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_IS_US_CITIZEN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the subscriber is a U.S. citizen.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The district of the mailing address for the subscriber on the coverage.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYER_DISTRICT_C_NAME

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_PHONE
columns.description: The home phone number for the subscriber on the coverage.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_FAX
columns.description: The fax number for the subscriber on the coverage.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_WORK_PHONE
columns.description: The work phone number for the subscriber on the coverage.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_BIRTH_DATE
columns.description: The date of birth for the subscriber on the coverage.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_MARITAL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The marital status of the subscriber.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Single


Married


Divorced

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_SSN
columns.description: The SSN number of the subscriber on a coverage

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_OCCUPATION
columns.description: The coverage subscriber's occupation.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_RETIRE_DATE
columns.description: The date when the coverage subscriber retired.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_SPOUSE_RETIRE_DATE
columns.description: The date when the coverage subscriber's spouse retired.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_ADDRESS_IS_VALID_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID which indicates whether the subscriber address has been validated.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Validated


Valid


Invalid


Could not validate (System Error)

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_ADDR_VALID_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID which indicates the validation method by which the subscriber address was validated.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Manually by end user


System-validated

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_ADDR_VALID_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC date and time when the subscriber address was last validated.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_BNK_ID
columns.description: Banking details of the subscriber.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_ALT_BILL_NAME
columns.description: The alternate billing name for the coverage subscriber.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_ALT_BIRTH_DATE
columns.description: The alternate subscriber date of birth override for use with interfaces.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_ALT_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The subscriber's sex as known to the payor. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SUBSCRIBER_SEX_C_NAME

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_CHAMPUS_STATUS
columns.description: The CHAMPUS/Tricare subscriber status.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_EMPLOYMENT_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the subscriber began working for the employer associated with the employer group.

columns.name: SUBSCRIBER_APPLICATION_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the subscriber applied for coverage.

columns.name: MEDICARE_SUBSCRIBER_IDENT
columns.description: The unique ID of the subscriber that will be used for supplemental claims.

columns.name: RQG_REL_TO_SUBSCRIBER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient to subscriber relationship category number for this coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Self


Spouse


Child


Employee


Unknown
